titleInfo.title: Diagnostics in combustion: Measurements to unravel combustion chemistry
Combustion Phenomena: Selected Mechanisms of Flame Formation, Propagation and Extinction

bibliographicCitation.apa_indent: Kohse-Höinghaus, K. (2009). Diagnostics in combustion: Measurements to unravel combustion chemistry. In J. Jarosinski & B. Veyssiere (Eds.), Combustion Phenomena: Selected Mechanisms of Flame Formation, Propagation and Extinction (pp. 3-13). Boca Raton: CRC Press.
